title: Zen Style 3 -4 Bed Sea-view Pool Villas in Ban Tai
description:
• 3-4 Bedroom, en-suite sea-view villas
• Award-winning reliable developer
• 2 Storey layout
• Fully furnished to high-standard
• Stylish Acacia-wood features
• Natural earthy/rustic design style
• Open-plan living & dining area
• Infinity-edge swimming pool
• Balinese stone tiles
• Large sun-terrace
• Open-air roof terrace area
• Fully fitted Western-style kitchen
• High-quality fittings & appliances
• Soaking tubs & rain-showers
• Government electricity & water
• Private parking area
• Land sizes: from 650 sqm
• Built size: 490 – 900 sqm
• Leasehold tenure
